website_summaries.verdict: Sony's DualShock 2 Analog Controller stands as the best of its generation and the blueprint for almost every controller released since.
pros: The Sony DualShock 2 Analog Controller is extremely responsive, has excellent force-feedback and is probably the most natural-feeling controller available
cons: It's wired, and it's not the most durable controller you'll ever use
Also, the d-pad isn't designed very well

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Currently a one star review. It is non-functional. I bought this one because it was advertised as a Sony produced controller for PS2 and I'd been worried a knock-off wouldn't work as well. When I purchased this, through Overstocked IT, I was thrilled it was only 13 dollars, but I was clearly conned. At this point, it behaves as though the analog stick or d-pad is perpetually going to the right. I am going to crack it open and see if anything is gummed up or not making contact, and if that works, I'll kick this review up a bit. If that doesn't work, though, it's going back and this review is staying exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic experience never gets old!!!! Better than the ps3 controller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ps2 controller since it's the perfect size handle wise. Excluding the 360 controller; The ps3 controller is a little too small,just wish it was the same size. If you ask me the controllers were better off wired like this one as the longevity is amazing over the ps3 ones. I owned my other one for over 6 years now!!!!!! These ones are more durable as well. The sensor in the ps3 ones are sensitive. One drop and BOOM it's broke unless you can take it apart and fix the sensor(YouTube vids can show you how). Not an issue with these controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Y Chromosome 99

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!!!!Poor condition, broken parts DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Controller worked for 20 minutes, then Kaput! I thought it was sticky buttons, upon inspection I found weights missing off right dual shock motor, broken 4 way button synchronizer, and upright supports on right side buttons R1 R2 broken. interesting enough the missing pieces were not in the controller housing leading me to believe that some one had open the controller removed broken parts and weights ,closed it up and shipped it full well knowing this controller was defective. Since I have taken the item apart, I feel returning it would be unethical . Chalk this up to another internet RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for these controllers
customer_reviews.text: Official Sony Branded controllers are the best and the only controllers i would recommend people to get. Most 3rd party controllers dont work anywhere near the same and are incredibly low quality so always stick with the same manufacturer of the console when hunting for controllers. They should always have their branding on their controllers. Exp. N64-Nintendo Snes-Nintendo X360-Microsoft PS1-Sony
customer_reviews.author: Madara Senpai

customer_reviews.title: All of the buttons work at last!
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing a working PS2 controller for a long time, finally I can do 2 player games! This controller works very well and does what controllers are supposed to do. After a long string of abused used controllers, I finally shelled out for a new one and I am glad I did. It's worth it to be able to use all of the buttons! The black color is not flashy, but it is functional. I have liked the Dualshock 2 better than the predecessor, mostly because I had certain games that were incompatible.
customer_reviews.author: RedstoneManor

customer_reviews.title: Best Option
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the best option, best middle-ground between buying a cheap knockoff and paying full price for new. Last year I bought an off-brand controller, one that seemed the best reviewed. It made my hands smell like cheap plastic and it lasted one month before breaking down. This controller looks almost new. I don't know how worn the insides are, so I have no idea how long it will last, but it seems just fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: W. G. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Freakin awesome
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm and it’s awesome to have a legitimate Sony controller again! Has some light scratches and wear, but nothing that actually mattered. There was a tiny piece sticking out at the base on the left side, but with a nail file, it disappeared and smoothed out. Very pleased with this purchase and have been using it daily with zero problems. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to replace my old aftermarket controllers. Aftermarket is nice for the price, but they just don't feel the same and they break after a short while. These on the other hand are of extremely good quality. Just like the originals I had, they work flawlessly and feel great in my hand. The improvements in control and button pressure really help as well. Makes enjoying my old classic games a lot of fun. Highly recommend these if you want to replace your controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Digital_Furry

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off.
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, I immediately noticed the plastic used for the outer casing was of a different texture and lower quality than a real Dualshock 2. I later found out mid-gam that it does not have the pressure-sensitivity feature demonstrated by a real Dualshock 2. A functional, but overpriced knockoff of a good controller.
customer_reviews.author: Vulgaris Magistralus

customer_reviews.title: Is it me or the controller?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is me or the controller, but the left analog stick keeps breaking. I have a closet with about 15 controllers. Many of them were the ones that cost @ $15. Some of those broke within weeks. This one lasted since May of 2017 - June 2020, so I believe it is the best one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Q Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works well- Real Sony controller!!
customer_reviews.text: Considering my PS2 still works, I still do enjoy the older games regardless of the poor graphics. Being able to have a real Sony controller that works is the best I can ask for and I am so glad that I found one! It works great and feels new in comparison to my very much used and now broken other two that I’ve had since PS2 first came out!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller used to replace my non-working controller. It was packaged well and had normal wear and tear. Slight issue with the D-Pad going a bit haywire when the PS2 console is started up, but nothing major that lingers around. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan P.

customer_reviews.title: not bad... not good
customer_reviews.text: 1 thing it DOES NOT do.. turn PS3 off or on..you have to do it yourself!....2ndly.. the wires slide out of the protective rubber sleeve on controller, meaning detachment is inevitable... other than that...its adequate
customer_reviews.author: david l burris

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like the original
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like the original! I seriously thought about replacing my PS2 controller with one of the third party controllers available at a cheaper price, but then I remembered, sometimes you really do get what you pay for. Well worth the money. The controller works the way it should with all of the buttons functioning correctly and the joystick movement is spot on. No issues with game characters not responding or doing things I don't want them to because the controller is malfunctioning. I can once again enjoy playing my PS2 games. YAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZenJack

customer_reviews.title: Bit expensive but so worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried unofficial controllers sold here on Amazon and the controls just weren't great. My gameplay was heavily affected by it, so I decided to invest in this official Sony controller and I LOVE IT! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Remi

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: I got a used one that claimed collectors grade or something and it was like a brand-new controller. So far its been working great but the X button is slightly sticking probably because of pressing it to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: The REAL PS2 controller
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive the actual controller in manufacturer packaging. I haven't tested it yet, and the packaging was in Japanese, but I am happy just the same. I'm purchasing a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Go with third-party unless you need the original
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these used. It works fine, and doesn't have any visible damage. The buttons are very worn from obvious extended usage, but it still functions. The lack of response makes it feel like a cheap knockoff. As much as I love the original I probably should have gone third-party instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: perfect: )
customer_reviews.text: this controller was my life saver. I recently bought a PS2 online from amazon. The system worked perfectly, but i guess the controller had met the end of its days (understandable). I was in desperate need of a new controller, came across this one and purchased it (among others). Came in an unopened plastic container with all instructions. perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Dani Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition *ACTUALLY NEW*
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as intended. Is new, no signs of usage, and came with the original ps2 packaging. That includes the way the controller is packed as the wire for it as well. However, smelling the package, I felt a strong smell of Cigar/Cigarette on the controller and plastic. It must be that the person that is holding the supply of these controllers smokes alot. The smell isn't much trouble either. With some soap and usage, the smell comes right off, and doesn't get stuck on you! Works flawlessly WOULD BUY AGAIN AND AGAIN 10/10 ( if I could give 10 stars. )
customer_reviews.author: Ilan R

customer_reviews.title: The authentic Sony Dualshock II
customer_reviews.text: You should be careful when purchasing used cables because you always want to make sure they come from the appropirate source. This controller is made by Sony and is exactly the same controller that came with the system when it launched. For my particular purchase, the joysticks stick a little but that's more a result of the seller than the actual product. This is what you want to buy if you need a replacement controller for your PS2. This controller will NOT work on Playstation 1 or 3 from what I was able to ascertain. I tested it on all three machines and the only one that worked (obvioulsy) was the Playstation 2 platform.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? The Dualshock
customer_reviews.text: Standard PS2 controller, honestly the only design I've ever used extensively. Got it for my PC and have logged in maybe 100 hours on various games, with about 50-60 in Super Street Fighter IV. This is the converter I use, by the way (, and JoyToKey is my binder, which works great for my purposes. Speaking of Street Fighter, it's not really the best controller for fighting games, I just happen to use it. Anyway, seems to work as I've always expected. $20 is a little steep, but the quality is pretty good. You can probably find a few decent knock offs if you're after something cheaper, though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great controller at great price
customer_reviews.text: We seem to go through controllers very quickly, and often the less expensive ones don't last long until the buttons stop responding, they don't vibrate or the cord gets damaged. These are great because they are made by Sony, meaning you know they will work perfectly with the PS2, are a better quality than most of the off brands, and are at a really great price! They respond perfectly and the cord is a good length. The Dualshock technlogy just adds a bit to the game experience and lets you know when the character has been hit or when something is occurring. I highly recommend these controllers over the off brand ones! Game on!
customer_reviews.author: CHEWIE

customer_reviews.title: So dirty!
customer_reviews.text: Very dirty Controller. Took me hours and to clean it. This is why I normally do not buy used - good items. "Normal wear and tear" Yeah, suuure. I've never seen a controller re-sold this disgusting. It passed the first test of working, so at least there is that. I'll edit this review if it doesnt work after i have time to really test it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Only the genuine article will do!
customer_reviews.text: It came in its original packaging and looked like it had sat in a window for a few years. I almost didn't want to open it! I don't trust cheap aftermarket replacements of anything in general, and the original controller lasted 9 years so I suspect this will be no different.
customer_reviews.author: John Tompson

customer_reviews.title: A bit different from old dualshock 2
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new PS2 controller after the up arrow on my 3 or 4 year old controller that came with the PS2(slim) stopped working. Everything about this new controller is the same as ever except that the directional buttons are kind of stiff and have this weird rough coating that makes me use the analog stick instead. It has me wondering if I'm actually getting an authentic Sony Dualshock 2 or a really good Chinese knockoff. I hated using the analog stick until I got this controller but nevertheless, it performs just as well as the old one (well, better now with all four working arrows lol)
customer_reviews.author: Ami D

customer_reviews.title: The only suitable controller for Playstation 2 for me.
customer_reviews.text: At this point in late 2008, Playstation 2 is nothing new. However, this is the first time I have had to replace my controller (I finally wore the other one out!). I ordered two recently at a great sale price (I ended up with two units for the price of 1 regularly. Free Super Saver Shipping was the icing on the cake.) I tried out a couple of generic controllers at a retail store recently and the buttons feel very cheap and less sensitive than these. I really couldn't image ever using another controller with my Playstation 2. It was incredible to experience a new controller after all of this time - absolute perfection for my gaming needs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pauley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite controller of all time.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this particular unit for over a year, and it still works just as good as it did when I got it. Not only did it revive my PS2 (bundled controller died) but it also serves as a gamepad for pc thanks to a USB adapter. The controller itself works well with action adventure and fighting games, but the lack of analog triggers a la the DS3 or DS4 controllers makes it less optimal than the 360 pad for shooters and racing games. An essential purchase in the lifetime of all semi-serious or serious gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't work. LED light turned in, but that's it. Tried on 3 different systems that another controller worked on still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: nosferatu

customer_reviews.title: Horrificly broken!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this controller, the first thing I checked was the condition. "Very good" it said. Yet when the controller arrived it was completely, utterly busted. The R1, Triangle, Circle, and R3 buttons are inputed simultaneously. The buttons don't respond at all, they're just permanently pressed. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: Vinke

customer_reviews.title: great controller!
customer_reviews.text: great controller...bought to use on my modded fat ps2 with 1tb hdd and really didn't want to use a wireless controller especially for games like gradius 5.
customer_reviews.author: NeoGeoMVS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these so I could break out the old PS2 with my 8 year old (PS2 seems less complicated than PS3/4 and easier for him to play). Works much better than the knockoff wireless controllers that were always breaking. Added 2 6ft extension cables for cheap and we are in back in business. Considering the amount of money that I spent on wireless controllers with my older son for this game, I would consider this a great value!
customer_reviews.author: T. Devine

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Brand Controller, just perfect... Exactly like the ones i had when u was younger 😍 like New!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this controller is good. It's better than the generic one I got
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this controller three stars because the start button is none responsive half the time. And the left joystick when pressed down stays down till you move it up. Other than that this controller is good. It's better than the generic one I got. That one's horrible.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted! 😁
customer_reviews.text: Product came brand new as described in original packaging from manufacturer, I’m using it and I love it! My First Gen Ps2 still works great but my original controller was malfunctioning, now I’m back with a brand new controller playing my Ps2 games, metal gear solid, the very first call of duty for Ps2 😁. I am completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Used controller - works
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, the used controller I bought is an authentic Sony controller. Works as well as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Sudi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite controller
customer_reviews.text: There is no substitute to the Sony brand controller. This is my favorite controller ever made. I connect them to my computer with a USB adapter and play old school games. It has the perfect amount of buttons and controls to play about 95% or more of my favorite childhood games. Most people see this controller and probably think ooh playstation. I see this controller and think ooh Nintendo, Sega, Super Nintendo, Nintendo 64, gameboy, gameboy advanced. Versatile controller!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Espenschied

customer_reviews.title: Great if you need a replacement controller for old PS2
customer_reviews.text: Great controller. Worked perfectly with my PS2 system. I'm glad that amazon even had one!! Was in perfect condition too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Nicole Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: I give it a 2
customer_reviews.text: Almost wanna return this. Analog stick gets stuck repeatedly every so often. Keeps movements going in the upward directions. Really annoying. There are several slicings in the core too. Works. Therefore I give it a 2
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this control, it feels very well in my hands. I've had a few of these because my little brother would always break them by throwing them to the floor... Anyways, a few weeks ago I found a box full of PS2 games that I had put away a few years ago, when I saw some of the great tittles I really felt like playing the PS2 again, but I didn't have a control, so, I bought one for about $10 and it works great just like the old ones... Anyways, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: We know what this is
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a ps2 controller. We both know what it is. You treat her right, and she will treat you right.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: The item looks fine but when you use it the "O" button is ...
customer_reviews.text: The item looks fine but when you use it the "O" button is not working properly. It was fine that buttons are slightly sensitive for being used but didn't expect it to get its so loose that you have to press hard the "O" Button
customer_reviews.author: Popo

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Up and left dpad arrows stick and don't register all the time. Triangle and square also don't always register as pressed. Over all the controller works just not the most responsive. I'm going to look else where for a new control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: genuine SONY!
customer_reviews.text: controller works great, genuine sony product for a good price. would buy again. only complaint is that the controller arrived very dirty and sticky - my thumbs were sticking right to the analog sticks, it was very gross. after a good rubdown with clorox and lysol it is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Leahey

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Doesn't Function.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a new PS2 controller since mine finally gave out after over a decade of use. I wanted something original to the PS2, and this seemed to be exactly what I was looking for. Contoller arrived and looked great, though it was a little dusty and the joysticks were slightly sticky. That would have been fine by me, except the L2 and R1 buttons don't work at all and the L1 button sticks. I also have to push insanely hard on the X and Square buttons for them to respond at all. Definitely not worth the money. Ended up buying a random copy controller that works fantastic for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Complete scam
customer_reviews.text: A complete ripoff; all it is, is a fake internal electronics and the OEM shell around. The joy sticks didn't even work when the controller first came in.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The controller was a bit sticky but nothing rubbing alcohol and a paper towel can’t fix
customer_reviews.author: Citlalli_707

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the price. Just wait for them to remaster the game on a newer system. It's okay you can wait.
customer_reviews.author: polarity Jones

customer_reviews.title: What you might expect, a very fine PS2 controller.
customer_reviews.text: Classic and durable PS2 controller. It's what you'd expect from a PS2 controller. Works fine in a PS2-to-USB adapter and an actual PS2. Have had it for a while now and it's not going to die on me anytime soon. This doesn't feel cheap, it doesn't look cheap, and the analog sticks don't give you blisters. A prime PS2 controller waiting for you, right here.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The original and best Sony controller
customer_reviews.text: What really makes this controller a must have is the vibration device as well as the easy access analog sticks and buttons. While I also like the Game Stop controller for PlayStation 2, The vibration effect is missing in some points of the game where the Sony controller reacts. I ordered this controller as an extra one after seeing it on Amazon at a good price. If you need another controller for PlayStation 2, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: John Prothero

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 uses...But seller righted the wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of time I used this controller (for about 2 hours each time), it worked fine, but around the 4th time of use, it stopped working. My PS2 only recognized it about 1/3 of the time and when it did, it did nothing but scroll through menus, leaving me NO control. This controller has received NO damage in my care and my PS2 is fine. F- ... UPDATE: When I contacted the seller about this issue they sent me a replacement controller within 6 weeks, even after almost a year since the purchase. The new controller works fine. The seller gets an A+! The transaction gets a C+.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Beats wireless
customer_reviews.text: Works great & no hassels like I had with wireless
customer_reviews.author: D MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: Good controller had to replace the one that was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: John-117

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy. Sony controllers always last for years
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected, very sturdy. Sony controllers always last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Sunryder

customer_reviews.title: Just as I had remembered it long ago.
customer_reviews.text: Recently I had gotten re-interested in PS2 and bought some titles (Resident Evil, Metal Gear, etc.) and I digged up my old PS2 to play them. However, the controller didn't work and I ordered one from here. Unfortunately at first I got a broken one as well (d-pad and joystick were broken) although I contacted the seller and they provided me with a new one, being very pleasant about it. Now I can play all my old titles again!
customer_reviews.author: Amerzon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEED IT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to relive the old days of the PlayStation! Wanted the original Sony controller and these are it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Always perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Always perfect. I do alot of online shopping from Amazon. In my family alone we have three different accounts. Amazon is always perfect from ordering to ripping the box open. I order so much from Amazon... I keep this text saved so I can always give a perfect review on all my orders without typing for every item I receive. Thank You for all you do; Allen
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: D-pad and face buttons didn’t work. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was exited to use this controller when it came in the mail. That excitement quickly turned to disappoint when I tried using it. None of the directional buttons worked, and only one of the face buttons worked. My advice is to go find a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Young

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another controller from you again
customer_reviews.text: Dualshock arrived on time. I'm satisfied. I may buy a couple more controllers soon. I played a lil' Kingdom Hearts and the controller is fine, so far. I will write another review in a couple months to let you know if it's still working. 5 stars ***** 10/6/13 It's still working. Yeah, get this controller everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ThatBoyShark

customer_reviews.title: OEM PS2 Controllers are the best
customer_reviews.text: It's an OEM PS2 controller. So it's great as it is. Despite it being used, it was in great condition. The R2 trigger sticks. But it may just have something from me jammed in it. No big deal honestly, because it's not really a problem and the controller works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nonheroichero

customer_reviews.title: Work good and clean
customer_reviews.text: Work good and clean, just be sure not to play any games that piss you off otherwise this guy will run out of stock. Otherwise, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Derp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement controller
customer_reviews.text: I still keep all my old games & gaming systems and as a result, age & wear eventually catch up. This controller is an excellent replacement for my worn one and does the job as it should. Shout out to Wholesale Outlet for their part in fulfilling this item thru Amazon. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: kristinakay

customer_reviews.title: Questionable..
customer_reviews.text: The controller was broken when it arrived. I inspected it when it arrived only to find that one of the prongs in the connector that connects to the Playstation was missing. I attempted to plug it in and use it anyway, however as I suspected it did not work. Be wary of the seller, I did not contact them so it may have been a fluke, however I don't think I quite believe it was accident.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Squier

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I still have a Playstation 2
customer_reviews.text: It's a PS2 controller. As much as I know I should move on to a PS4, I still love many of the games on this port released over a decade ago. The device works as well as the original that comes with box (probably because it's an OEM part).
customer_reviews.author: ScipioIV

customer_reviews.title: Brand new
customer_reviews.text: With the PlayStation 2 so far outdated, and my controller biting the dust, I didn't expect to find accessories not only still available, but in their original, unopened packaging. Now I can play the old games again that no one saw fit to port for download on the newer consoles!
customer_reviews.author: Lycoplax

customer_reviews.title: PS2 FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: Sony makes great products. The PS2 is the best system I have ever owned...My last controllers were in storage for a number of years due to moves and stopped working on the left side. These new controllers have restored my game system to like new...thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rowdeo Cwby

customer_reviews.title: Far from "Good"
customer_reviews.text: Controller arrived dusty and dirty. Advertised as "good" quality, but one of the analogs gets stuck, the X button barely works, and the "down arrow" on the d-pad also provides a "circle button" input for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: SpeCt3r1995

customer_reviews.title: original sony product
customer_reviews.text: love using official sony products feels right at home when im playing
customer_reviews.author: DEATHWISH1988

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this controller used
customer_reviews.text: December 2015:I bought this controller used from what I thought was an honest seller and a few of the buttons did not work. I would not recommend buying this controller used. I would just buy thisits not the original, but will probably be better than anything used. 2 stars because some of the buttons worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best controller you can get for the system. Its durable, reliable and its black color gives it a sleeker look than before. Its not pressure sensitive for the games that support the feature. It comes with a good length of cable aswell, around 6 feet I think. I dont remember. Buttons featured are all the same, L1, L2, R1, R2, the D pad, 2 analog sticks, start, select, analog power up, X O and triangle.
customer_reviews.author: D.N.

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because one didn't work when received, (bought used). Great product, though!
customer_reviews.text: One of the controllers didn't work when recieved, however the other worked just fine (ordered 2). I did buy used, however. Other than that, they're official Sony controllers so they work as they should and work well! Sony quality rarely faults out.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: it's better to buy the original
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the cheaper knockoff I previously purchased. On occasion it miscommunicates my input, but it's hard to beat the original Sony controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Lillis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy to say that it's an official ps2 controller and I tested the buttons and analogs; they work fantastically and feel like new. The dpad is a little worn down but besides that its flawless. Thank you Worldwide Ace for the quality buy. I forgot to mention it was delivered two days prior to minimum wait time!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not a stock Sony controller.
customer_reviews.text: I got a no-name Chinese wireless controller of inferior quality instead of the stock controller listed. Seller offered refund, but I haven't the time to jack around with RMAs, returns, traffic and standing in line at the post office.. Stuck with it and don't even know if it works..
customer_reviews.author: JayConsumer

customer_reviews.title: good replacement for worn out controller
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a worn out controller on my beloved PS2 console. It worked perfectly right out of the box. The PS2 doesn't see much action now with the 3 and 4 in the house but I like knowing it's there intact if ever I want to get nostalgic.

customer_reviews.title: Why waste your money on a old new product?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this like new because it was a lot cheaper, what do you know it came as advertised. It's like if you go by seller ratings you actually get decent product, no way. It actually looks brand new still even has the sparkly sheen that ps2 controllers have when they're new.

customer_reviews.title: I love this controller
customer_reviews.text: Great controller for the PS2. The dualshock beats any of the third party PS2 controllers. I recommend this controller to all.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a heavily discounted used controller that was rated as "Acceptable" - but it looks and works as well as a brand new product! I'm using this on my PC withand everything from the analog sticks to the d-pad works perfectly. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought one of these in it's original packing from another site, but I also bought a used one on here. It's just a classic controller for PS2 and it works to perfection. In my mind, Sony had revolutionized the gaming industry when the PS1 came out and when they introduced the "Dual-Shock" controllers shortly after. Love the classics!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Used is Used
customer_reviews.text: I have a kid who is rough on controllers. He has a disability. THey are Sony and I would accept no less. Out of the two controller I bought one has a thumb controller with a tilt. Sometime I get unopen boxes brandy new and other times me and my boy get ones that are pre-broken. I would recommend this site if the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a classic, and official controller for the Playstation 2. It feels way better to use than the non-Sony controllers I've used. Really worth paying more to get, rather than the cheaper off-brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nick.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Like Original
customer_reviews.text: Controller feels like the original. No issues with buttons or connectivity. Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Es muy bueno.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like copying one of the Spanish reviews and pasting it into this one. It's been out for 12 years. What is there to know at this point? Aside from a keyboard and mouse, It's the most comfortable controller that I've used in my 20+ years of gaming. Just don't get frustrated and throw it against the ground. It's not the most durable thing. You may have read some reviews that say the buttons stick, and that is true, sometimes. It's certainly been an inconsistent experience for me. And it's probably not a good thing that, in 2013, it still costs more than most games out for the PS2 now. Wait, this is a four star review?
customer_reviews.author: subMJM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The controller I got is in poor condition. It feels like it’s going to snap in half and the rubber came off the left analog stick after the second time I used the controller.

customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a working controller in "very good" condition as it was described when I purchased it. Instead, I received a controller that was missing the top on the left stick and only half of the directional pad works. In this state the controller is basically unusable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Additional Controller
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for the actual Sony Dualshock controller for my brother's PS2. He was hesitant with the off-brand ones, and is glad to be using the stock one from Sony. Not much to report on here, it's identical to what comes with a PS2. Cable is sufficiently long, and everything functions properly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: New life for PS2
customer_reviews.text: All of the old (original controllers) had either failed or were close to failing. Finding these controllers (new) on the shelf of a store today is not likely, glad to find OEM controllers at a reasonable price. New life life for a classic gaming machine.

customer_reviews.title: Name brand but width the premium
customer_reviews.text: Came in retail sony packaging. Works as expected... Replaces a cheap knock off that broken within a few month... I opened the broken controller to compare with the sony and you definitely see the difference in quality of parts and why the knock off failed.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: Best Controller Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: The Playstation Dualshock controller is by far the best controller ever made. It is beyond comfortable in your hand and super durable. Having thrown a control or two during my more intense gaming days, I know that this puppy can take it.

customer_reviews.author: Midori

product_meta.title: PlayStation 2 Dualshock Controller Black
product_meta.description:
The Dual Shock Controller has graduated to the next level. We're talking sensitive here; the buttons are now pressure sensitive, with up to 255 levels of sensitivity. Exciting, you betcha! This could mean surgical precision as you accelerate, decelerate or maneuver through a course. Or, even more fighting moves and secret weapons available as you battle the forces of evil. Ready, set, game!

AMAZON.COM
The layout of PlayStation2's Dual Shock 2 controller is nearly identical to that of the original PlayStation's Dual Shock controller, which is good news for most gamers. The main new feature is that, when the buttons are pushed, the controller can register how much pressure is being exerted. This adds a completely new dimension to sports, racing, fighting, and more games. Aside from the Start and Select buttons, all of the functions are analog for greater control, a wider variety of operations, and a more compelling interactive experience. Two convex analog thumb pads and two force-feedback solenoid rumblers round out the features. This controller is also compatible with all software that supports the original Dual Shock controller.
feature_bullets: Features 12 analog keys to add intelligence to your gaming
Twin Dual Shock motors rumble with each action making every impact feel like you're right in the game
All the features you need to take complete control of your gaming!
